title: Jupyter Notebook does not works on Bash on Ubuntu on Windows
body: I would like to use Jupyter Notebook on Bash on Ubuntu on Windows to leverage some on *nix only python packages like tensorflow.

comments.body: There is a workaround for running IPython notebook on WSL. Have a look at this https://github.com/Microsoft/BashOnWindows/issues/185#issuecomment-238018167
